jobsJson.descriptionPlain:
As the one voice that will impact the lives of millions of Gojek Drivers, you are to join the end-to-end stream of Online Engagement campaign:

- Solving problems our Drivers face through communication.
- Create a Communication Guideline. A well-developed guideline is an essential tool for establishing brand identity & solving problems. This guide acts as a key document that helps us communicate a consistent message to Drivers as our audience.
- Produce creative direction and strategy for all sorts of communication to Drivers.
- Conduct several A/B tests & provide in-depth communication analysis for continuous improvement.
- Support, mentor, and analyze designers’ strength, weakness, and passion, in order to optimize their capabilities.

jobsJson.additionalPlain:
Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!

lists.content:
• Has strong creative and conceptual vision for digital communication and the ability to execute high quality communication in relation to strategic business objectives.
  • Possesses strong expertise in communication design (art/copywriting based)
  • Strong in conceptual thinking, concept creation, and translating business objectives into communication strategy
  • Has strong leadership skill, strong work ethic, and particularly, committed to a vision even under pressure
  • Able to direct creative teams including visual communication designers, copywriters, videographers
  • Minimum 4 years of experience in working in communication field.
  • Preferable from marketing agency/ Art Director
  • Most importantly, has a strong sense of purpose and a good heart to make a difference!
